text: Hi!  I’m rendering some Makie plots in VSCode, and I’m finding that even when I set the figure resolution to be quite high, VSCode displays them at low resolution.  Does anyone know how to fix this and get VSCode to show the full-resolution plot?

elements.text: Hi!  I’m rendering some Makie plots in VSCode, and I’m finding that even when I set the figure resolution to be quite high, VSCode displays them at low resolution.  Does anyone know how to fix this and get VSCode to show the full-resolution plot?

text: I am having some strange problems with rendering too. I would try display(theFigure) and see if the rendering changes. In my case, I was looking for a separate window from GLMakie, but ended up plotting in the vscode plot plane at low resolution and static. If you are having the same problem, this would explain why you have low resolution.
